divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing on the deck having a smoke at 1045pm. a bright flash to the north caught my attention,i observed a sphere moving south very quickly. it stopped suddenly....then moved sideways....stopped and hovered in a position about a quarter mile from the house.about five hundred feet up it sat there flashing and wobbling. it flashed 6 to 8 times a second,and seemed to wobble back and forth slightly. there were few visable stars as there was considerable cloud cover. i ran in the house grabbed the camera, returned to take photos. at that point the object was even lower in the sky..i snapped these photos with a tripod.....then the sphere just vanished. i have hundreds of photos like this....i see similar objects no less than 3 times a week. have yet to see photos like these.....no it is not camera shake....was shot with a tripod.
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around June 17th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: extremely bright sphere flashing 6 to eight times per second
